Classes in org.springframework.security.ldap used by org.springframework.security.ldap
InitialDirContextFactory
          Deprecated. Use SpringSecurityContextSource instead
LdapUsernameToDnMapper
          Constructs an Ldap Distinguished Name from a username.
SpringSecurityContextSource
          Extension of ContextSource which allows binding explicitly as a particular user.
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ldap used by org.springframework.security.ldap.populator
LdapAuthoritiesPopulator
          Obtains a list of granted authorities for an Ldap user.
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ldap used by org.springframework.security.ldap.search
LdapUserSearch
          Obtains a user's information from the LDAP directory given a login name.
